scrim-info.description: Displays all match information from team and date

scrim-add.description: Adds a scrim to specified team database

scrim-remove.description: Removes a scrim from a team based on database ID

team-add.description: Creates a new team database and set's schedule chat (ChannelID)

team-list.description: Displays a list of all teams and schedule ID's

team-edit.description: Changes name of team and or Schedule Channel ID

help.description: Displays list of commands according to permissions

schedule.description: Displays the weeks schedule for a team

perm-add.description: Adds a permission to a specific command

perm-remove.description: Removes a permission to a specific command
